classifiers: license :: osi approved :: gnu general public license (gpl)
description:
provides management of stack based global variables.  these variables
        may be probed from calling stacks, etc, and can include other external
        dictionaries for processing.
name: environ
kwds:
context globals environ provides management of stack based global variables.  these variables
        may be probed from calling stacks, etc, and can include other external
        dictionaries for processing. stack based globals management
